name: Left Alone (itch) (Shresth Kumar)
description:
A action based game in which you need to kill all your enemies to win and move to the next level .It has multiple levels and three different maps to play in  .It has more than 5 weapons including a bow and arrow .It also has an endless mode in which the enemies will keep spawning and you need to kill them .You have twenty bullets in each of your gun before you need to reload.

Controls:

W/A/S/D : Movement

Mouse : Look

 Space : Jump

C : Crouch

LMB : Shoot

RMB : Aim

Number keys: Switch weapons

Esc : Pause
